name: The ancient amulet of the druids
data: It increases the users constitution pitifully.
It increases the users wisdom impressively.
It has low armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration nicely.
This item loses its magical powers very fast.
It gives tiny bonus to the skill 'mastery of medicine'.
It gives tiny bonus to the skill 'mastery of shielding'.
It affects the user's skill knowledge.
